product_name: Tifosi Slip Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Slip Fototec photochromic sunglasses boast Tifosi's widest light transmission range and automatically adjust tint so you can keep performing without interruption. Fototec(TM) lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten in dim conditions. Polymer lenses feature NXT(R) technology, originally designed for military helicopter windshields, to offer virtually shatterproof optical clarity. NXT lenses transition between light and dark tint quicker than other photochromic lenses, and are 10% lighter. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Adjustable, hydrophilic rubber nosepieces and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Glare Guard(TM) reflective lens coating reduces glare and decreases eye fatigue. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to reduce fogging. Fit medium to large faces. Tifosi Slip Fototec sunglasses come with a hardshell zippered case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Slip Fototec photochromic sunglasses boast Tifosi's widest light transmission range and automatically adjust tint so you can keep performing without interruption.
